Taking a Long Rest will fully restore the party's Hit Points (HP) and Spell Slots, as well as any Actions, Spells or Features that have charges or 'cooldowns', and Items with special uses. This is also the prime time to advance your Companion Quests and view unique cutscenes with them. Do note that in Early Access, you can only encounter one cutscene/bonding moment with each Companion per Long Rest, even if you took steps to be eligible for more. To view more Camp cut
